description:
Small form-factor, big performance. The Nickel 60 has more going for it than many lights twice its size. With 6 different modes, mode memory and easy USB-charging, this compact option will change your views on small bike lights.

  • 6 modes: high (1.5 hours at 60 lumens), medium (2.5 hours at 30 lumens), low (5 hours at 15 lumens), quick flash (20 hours), signal flash (2.5 hours) and warning flash (2 hours)
  • Easy USB charging means you no longer have to get by with "good enough" batteries
  • Light and efficient lithium-polymer batteries
  • 2-level battery indicator lets you know when it's time to charge
  • Silicone strap attaches to wrist, backpack, seat post, chainstays, forks, keychain or your pet's collar
  • O-ring seal makes this light ready for heavy rain – it's waterproof, but not submersible
name: MEC Nickel 60 USB Front Light
